### Chrome Extension: **X-Feed Cleaner**

**Overview:**
X-Cleaner is a streamlined and effective Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on X.com by removing unnecessary distractions. Whether it's the timeline feed, trends, premium offers, or live content, X-Cleaner gives you control over what you see, allowing you to focus only on what matters. With an easy-to-use interface, you can hide specific elements in just a few clicks, simplifying your online experience.

**Who It's For:**
X-Cleaner is ideal for users looking to reduce distractions while browsing X.com. Whether you’re a professional seeking focus, or just someone who prefers a minimalist browsing experience, X-Cleaner lets you declutter the homepage and get rid of unwanted content effortlessly. It adjusts dynamically, ensuring hidden elements stay out of view even when new content loads.

---

### **Key Features:**
- 🗑️ **Hide Timeline Feed:** Remove the main content feed to focus on other parts of the site.
- 🔍 **Hide Trends & Premium Sections:** Clean up the sidebar by eliminating the "Trends for You" and "Subscribe to Premium" sections.
- 💡 **Hide Live Content:** Suppress live content streams from the interface for a more focused browsing session.
- 🎛️ **Customizable Toggle:** Enable or disable hidden sections via a user-friendly popup menu.
- 🚀 **Dynamic Content Hiding:** Continuously hides the chosen elements as the page updates.
- 🧑‍💻 **Lightweight & Efficient:** Runs in the background with minimal impact on browser performance.

---

### **How It Works:**
X-Cleaner uses a script that runs in the background to automatically hide distracting elements on X.com, such as your timeline, trends, and premium suggestions. The extension includes a built-in toggle that allows you to customize which elements you want to hide or display at any time.

Simply use the toggle switches in the extension’s popup to control which parts of the site remain visible. Whether you're blocking the feed or hiding trends, all settings take effect immediately and stay active even as the site updates with new content.

---

### **Icons & Structure:**
- **🗑️ Clean Feed:** Remove timeline feed to maintain a distraction-free browsing experience.
- **🔍 Hide Trends & Premium:** Clean up the sidebar by removing trends and premium prompts.
- **💡 Disable Live Content:** Hide the "Live on X" section for a more streamlined view.
- **🎛️ Custom Toggles:** Easily manage visible and hidden sections with intuitive toggle switches.
- **🚀 Fast & Lightweight:** Optimized for speed and minimal browser impact.

**Interface Design:**
- **Extension Icon:** A minimalist and professional icon that symbolizes control and clarity.
- **Popup Interface:** Features clean toggle switches with clear labels for each customizable element (e.g., "Hide Feed," "Hide Trends," "Hide Live on X").

---

### **Privacy & Transparency:**
X-Cleaner is an open-source extension that does not collect any personal data. Its only purpose is to provide a more focused and distraction-free browsing experience on X.com. You can use it confidently, knowing your privacy is fully respected.
